kv3.10:3.1_0: Nanu asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaroti?
kv3.10:3.3_0: Atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlanti?
kv3.10:4.2_0: Hañci asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaro, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:4.3_0: “atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan”ti.
kv3.10:4.6_0: ‘asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:4.7_0: ‘atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:5.2_0: “atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan”ti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:5.5_0: “vattabbe kho ‘asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlaṁ, atthi devesu saṁvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:5.6_0: ‘atthi devesu asaṁvaro, yamhā asaṁvarā saṁvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:6.1_0: Atthi manussesu saṁvaro, atthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:6.3_0: Atthi devesu saṁvaro, atthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:7.1_0: Atthi devesu saṁvaro, natthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:7.3_0: Atthi manussesu saṁvaro, natthi tattha asaṁvaroti?
kv3.10:12.1_0: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:12.3_0: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:13.1_0: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:13.3_0: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:14.1_0: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:14.3_0: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:15.1_0: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:15.3_0: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:16.3_0: Sabbe devā pāṇātipātino adinnādāyino kāmesumicchācārino musāvādino surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinoti?
